h3_title: Poison Chief Fights and Boss Guides
content: Just like stone bosses and the flint bosses from Chapter 5, most of the attacks from the Poison Chief will be charges and slams. It will try to use the weight of its body to attack while delivering smatterings of poison around the area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Poison_Chiefs.md', within the main section titled 'Poison Chiefs', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection 'Poison Chief Fights and Boss Guides'.
The content is as follows:
Just like stone bosses and the flint bosses from Chapter 5, most of the attacks from the Poison Chief will be charges and slams. It will try to use the weight of its body to attack while delivering smatterings of poison around the area.
